title: Rental House Website
description: A full-stack rental housing platform with user roles for tenants, landlords, and admins. Features include listing management, booking workflows, and integrated payments.
features: Role-based dashboards for Admin, Landlord, and Tenant
JWT authentication and route protection
Landlords can create, update, and delete rental listings
Tenants can send booking requests and pay rent
Admins manage users and listings records
Integrated Sslcommerz payment gateway
Cloudinary for image uploads (listing photos, floor plans)
Responsive UI built with Tailwind CSS and custom layouts
challenges: Managing complex role-based routing logic securely
Ensuring accurate rent payment validation and booking state transitions
Uploading, updating and managing multiple Cloudinary images per listing
improvements: Add real-time chat between landlords and tenants
Implement booking calendar view for landlords
Improve SEO with server-side rendering (SSR) optimizations

title: Bike Museum Website
description: An e-commerce bike shop platform with filtering, product management, and secure checkout. Built using the MERN stack and integrated with SurjoPay.
features: Product listing with filtering and pagination
Admin dashboard for product management
Secure checkout with quantity validation
Order history for both users and admins
JWT-based authentication with private/public routes
Payment integration via Sslcommerz
Custom RTK Query setup for data fetching
Fully responsive interface with Tailwind CSS
challenges: Handling edge cases in product quantity validation during checkout
Managing token refresh and state with RTK Query and JWT
Ensuring responsive design across multiple screen sizes
improvements: Add customer reviews and rating system
Enable admin to view real-time sales analytics
Switch to Stripe for better international payment support

title: Saudi Cuisine Website
description: A responsive restaurant website with digital menu, reservation form, and animations for a premium dining experience.
features: Interactive homepage with animation transitions (Framer Motion)
Book a table for up to 5 people directly from the site.
View featured dishes and client testimonials with interactive sliders.
Smooth scroll navigation and responsive layout
Modern UI design using Tailwind CSS and DaisyUI
Simple static frontend (no backend)
challenges: Designing a modern UI without backend functionality
Handling form input validation with minimal JS
improvements: Add admin panel to manage menu and bookings
